sqlMap.select: select b.n_num, b.n_writer, b.n_title, to_char(b.n_content), b.n_count, to_char(b.n_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') n_Date, count(c.nc_num) as "comment" from (select a.n_num, a.n_writer, a.n_title, a.n_content, a.n_count, a.n_date, rownum rnum from (select n_num, n_writer, n_title, n_content, n_count, n_date from art_notice order by n_num desc) a ) b left outer join art_notice_comment c on b.n_num = c.linkedarticlenum where rnum between #startArticleNum# and #endArticleNum# group by b.n_num, b.n_writer, b.n_title, to_char(b.n_content), b.n_count, b.n_date, b.rnum order by b.n_num desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ART_NOTICE (N_NUM, N_TITLE, N_WRITER, N_DATE, N_COUNT, N_CONTENT) VALUES (notice_board_seq.nextval, #n_title#, #n_writer#, sysdate, #n_count#, #n_content#)
sqlMap.select: select b.n_num, b.n_writer, b.n_title, to_char(b.n_content), b.n_count, to_char(b.n_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') n_date, count(c.nc_num) as "comment" from (select a.n_num, a.n_writer, a.n_title, a.n_content, a.n_count, a.n_date, rownum rnum from (select n_num, n_writer, n_title, n_content, n_count, n_date from art_notice where $type$ like '%$keyword$%' order by n_num desc) a ) b left outer join art_notice_comment c on b.n_num = c.linkedarticlenum where rnum between #startArticleNum# and #endArticleNum# group by b.n_num, b.n_writer, b.n_title, to_char(b.n_content), b.n_count, b.n_date order by b.n_num desc
select count(n_num) from ART_NOTICE where $type$ like '%$keyword$%'
sqlMap.update: update ART_NOTICE set n_title = #n_title#, n_writer = #n_writer#, n_content = #n_content# where n_num = #n_num#
update ART_NOTICE set n_count = #n_count# where n_num = #n_num#
